FuncDef: The reset multicast remote-backup igmp-snooping statistics command clears statistics about IGMP messages in RBP buffers in an IGMP snooping hot backup scenario.
CLIs: reset multicast remote-backup igmp-snooping statistics slot <slot-id>
reset multicast remote-backup igmp-snooping statistics interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> }

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about IGMP messages in the RBP buffer of a specified interface.
-

Clears statistics about IGMP messages in all RBP buffers of a specified board.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset multicast remote-backup igmp-snooping statistics slot 1
<HUAWEI> reset multicast remote-backup igmp-snooping statistics interface Eth-Trunk 3
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an IGMP snooping dual-device hot backup scenario, if statistics about IGMP messages in RBP buffers are not needed or overstocked, run the reset multicast remote-backup igmp-snooping statistics command to clear the statistics about IGMP messages.
